mapper.select: select m.menu_id, m.menu_title, m.menu_eng_title, m.menu_content, m.menu_ice_hot, m.menu_onesize, c.category_name, a.admin_id from menu m join category c on m.category_id = c.category_id join admin a on m.admin_num = a.admin_num where m.menu_id = #{menu_id} and m.menu_del = 'N'

select m.menu_id, m.menu_title, m.menu_eng_title, m.menu_content, m.menu_ice_hot,m.menu_date,m.menu_update, m.menu_onesize, c.category_name, a.admin_id from menu m join category c on m.category_id = c.category_id join admin a on m.admin_num = a.admin_num where m.menu_del = 'N'
select nut_id, nut_saturated, nut_sugar, nut_sodium, nut_protein, nut_caffeine, nut_calorie, nut_high_caffeine, nut_size, nut_unit from nutrient where menu_id = #{menu_id}
select a.all_id, a.all_name from allergen a join menu_allergen ma on a.all_id = ma.all_id where ma.menu_id = #{menu_id}
